Xulgath Gutrager.name: Xulgath Gutrager
Xulgath Gutrager.publicNotes:
Xulgath gutragers exhibit more extreme developments along the same physiological path as their bilebearer cousins (Pathfinder Adventure Path #151: The Show Must Go On). They are stockier and faster, with necks and limbs corded with muscle. They are also denser, with multiple stomachs full of fluids even more caustic than those of the bilebearer. Like the bilebearer, gutragers lack the distinctive stench typical of most xulgaths。

A gutrager's torso conceals its most disturbing feature-a densely coiled esophagus. Pressurized bladders and a muscular throat allow the gutrager to propel its esophagus outward in an explosion of yellow flesh and acidic bile; caustic stomach acid coating the esophagus makes even brief physical contact with the organ dangerous. As a last resort, the gutrager can intentionally accelerate the corrosion in its esophagus, releasing vile acid in a burst that also ends its life。

Counterspell.name: 反制法术 Counterspell
Counterspell.description:
触发 一个生物施展了地蜥人法师拥有的法术；

Xulgath Spinesnapper.name: 鳍棘地蜥人 Xulgath Spinesnapper
Xulgath Spinesnapper.publicNotes:
地蜥人的生理多样性并不总意味着剧烈的变化；有些地蜥人不过是比它们的同类更高大、更强壮。虽然像断骨者、挤髓者等类似的暴力绰号也很常见，但大多数地蜥人称这些亲族为鳍棘。典型的鳍棘有9尺高，350磅重。

在战斗中，鳍棘们有着如同长柄重锤般的速度、优雅和力量。它们是理想的突击部队与优良的第一道防线。当氏族间的冲突导致决斗时，鳍棘大都被要求去应战。在这种情况下，每个氏族都会派出一名摆好架势的鳍棘作代表，参加一场理论上不致命的摔跤比赛。比赛结束后，胜者会刮掉败者的一些鳞片作为战利品。

Xulgath Stoneliege.name: Xulgath Stoneliege
Xulgath Stoneliege.publicNotes: Stonelieges are xulgaths magically infused with living earth—the very bones of the world. They are created through a process xulgaths call stone-binding, which can be performed with complex alchemy, powerful psychic magic, or Abyssal rituals. Their scales are like stone slabs, and their bones are as dense as bedrock, so they are among the hardiest and longest-lived xulgaths. To stonelieges, earth is as mutable as water, and their innate power to shape the soil and stone beneath their feet makes them integral members of xulgath society (as well as formidable combatants)。

效果 The stoneliege commands nearby earth to attack a foe. The stoneliege makes a claw Strike against a creature that is within 60 feet of the stoneliege and 10 feet of an earthen surface, such as dirt, mud, stone, or sand. The Strike originates from the surface's square and has a reach of 10 feet. On a critical hit, the target is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Earthen Torrent.name: Earthen Torrent
Earthen Torrent.description:
频率 每分钟一次

需求 The stoneliege is standing on or next to at least 10 cubic feet of dirt, stone, or other earthen material

效果 The stoneliege creates a violent wave of roiling earth. Creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] take [[/r {7d8}[bludgeoning]]]{7d8钝击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true] save; on a critical failure, creatures are also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone})。

Stone Throes.name: Stone Throes
Stone Throes.description: The stoneliege turns their own body into solid stone like a statue and immediately becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified}. Any creature grappled or restrained by the stoneliege becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}; to get free, the creature must damage the statue enough to break it or succeed at a @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:28|name:Escape Stone Throes|traits:action:escape] check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}。

Xulgath Thoughtmaw.name: Xulgath Thoughtmaw
Xulgath Thoughtmaw.publicNotes: Xulgath thoughtmaws are inheritors of the xulgaths' ancient psychic legacy. They eagerly and liberally use their ability to extract knowledge from their foes to quicken their own prodigious intellects。

Yaganty.name: Yaganty
Yaganty.publicNotes:
Yaganties are lean, hairy humanoids with lanky torsos, horned heads, and bulbous black eyes. The elongated fingers of one their hands are made of candlestick wax, and their fingertips, which have wicks instead of nails, burn endlessly. In the dead of night, the flickering light of a yaganty's fingertips casts dramatic shadows across their face and highlights their trollish visage。

Yaganty fables follow a common formula. A wayward pedestrian, traveling at night and usually in a forest, follows distant lights with the hope that the lights belong to a fellow wayfarer, only to come face-to-face with a gangly monster. The story ends in one of three ways: the traveler appeals to the yaganty with a gift of gold (the exact sum necessary varies wildly by the telling), the yaganty slays the traveler over some incomprehensible transgression, or, even more inexplicably, the yaganty offers the lost traveler five candles in simple charity so that the light might guide them home。

Light in the Darkness.name: Light in the Darkness
Light in the Darkness.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

The flames from a yaganty's fingers shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and are visible even in areas affected by magical darkness, but they do not shed dim light beyond that radius. Any creature within 60 feet in an area of darkness or dim light that sees the yaganty's candle fingers must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} by the yaganty for 1 minute or until the yaganty uses a hostile action against the creature, whichever comes first。

Vulnerability to Extinguishing.name: Vulnerability to Extinguishing
Vulnerability to Extinguishing.description: A yaganty who is doused with water or otherwise has their candle fingers extinguished takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Mental3d6.success], becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1}, and screams in agony until they reignite their candles (typically by casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} and lighting their fingers with an Interact action)。

Fling Wax.name: Fling Wax
Fling Wax.description:
The yaganty whips a stream of scalding wax in a @Template[type:line|distance:30]. Each glob deals [[/r {1d6}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}. An affected creature or adjacent ally can remove one glob of wax by spending an Interact action to scrape it off. The yaganty can't use Fling Wax again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}. Creatures in the area must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:27|traits:damaging-effect] save。

大成功 The creature is unaffected。

成功 The creature is splattered with [[/r 1d2+1]]{1d2+1 globs of wax}。

失败 The creature is splattered with [[/r 1d4+2]]{1d4+2 globs of wax}。

大失败 As failure, and the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} until it removes the globs of wax。

Zuipnyrn.name: 祖普尼恩 Zuipnyrn
Zuipnyrn.publicNotes:
这种引人注目的奇特生物偶尔会出现于内海的各个巡回马戏团中，尽管狂欢节上招徕客人的家伙们对这种奇怪生物的起源有很多说法，但这种所谓的“月亮鼹鼠”实际上是一种叫做祖普尼恩的外星生物，来自格拉利昂所属恒星系之外的一颗遥远的行星。

婴儿期的祖普尼恩是一个毛茸茸的球形生物，其上除了一根眼柄和一个圆形、无齿的进食口外别无他物。祖普尼恩的身躯特别柔软、延展性极强，这让它能经受住坠落和其他危害。它的眼柄能产生一道眩目的光来作为防御，在面对危险时给它足够的时间逃跑。更难以置信的是，祖普尼恩可以从它的眼睛散发出一种催眠灵光，令它周围的人着迷——它用这种能力来避免冲突，并说服旁观者帮助它逃离危险情形。随着它们年龄的增长，祖普尼恩通过长出额外的肢体，萌发额外的感觉器官，发展出鳃，或改变其解剖结构来适应环境。

Alluring Aspect.name: 诱人外貌 Alluring Aspect
Alluring Aspect.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

每当一个生物在灵光中结束回合，他必须进行@Check[type:will|dc:22]豁免。豁免失败则被祖普尼恩@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}1分钟。一旦迷魂时间结束，其会临时免疫灵光效果1小时。

祖普尼恩可以用一个带有“专注”特征的单动作关闭或启动此灵光。

Beguiling Gaze.name: 迷人凝视 Beguiling Gaze
Beguiling Gaze.description:
祖普尼恩试图魅惑30尺内一个被它@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}的生物。目标必须尝试@Check[type:will|dc:22]豁免。无论豁免成功与否，目标临时免疫此能力1小时。

大成功 目标不受影响并不再被迷魂。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 目标对祖普尼恩的态度转为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{乐于帮助 Helpful}1小时。

大失败 目标在一天内对祖普尼恩的态度转为“乐于帮助”，并将积极地尝试保卫它，甚至为此冒生命危险。

Blinding Flare.name: 致盲闪光 Blinding Flare
Blinding Flare.description:
祖普尼恩的眼镜发出一道眩目的光。@Template[type:cone|distance:30]区域内的所有生物必须进行@Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]豁免。祖普尼恩在1分钟内无法再次使用此能力。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1轮。

失败 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}1轮，目眩1分钟。

大失败 目标目盲1分钟。
